summary: Complete testing of SEO Assistant feature (Gelişmiş AI SEO Asistanı). All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend SEO Assistant UI fully functional with all 6 sub-tabs working: Dashboard, Kelimeler (Keywords), Denetim (Audit), Rakip (Competitor), Meta, Optimizer. Admin login flow at /admin-login works correctly. Homepage loads successfully at / with age verification popup, hero section, match data, and bonus sites section visible.

issues: Popup appears on every page load and blocks content until clicked. Consider adding localStorage persistence to remember user's age verification choice.

action_items: OPTIONAL: Add localStorage persistence for age verification popup to avoid showing it on every visit
Previous iteration issue still present: react-helmet-async v2.0.5 incompatibility in MatchDetailPage - SEO meta tags are disabled
critical_code_review_comments: SEO Assistant backend endpoints are well-structured with proper error handling and JSON parsing fallbacks
Reports are saved to MongoDB seo_reports collection for history tracking
AI endpoints use Emergent LLM integration correctly with gpt-5.2 model
Frontend SeoAssistant.jsx component is well-organized with separate tab components

success_rate.frontend: 100% (Admin login, SEO Assistant tabs, Homepage all working)

seed_data_creation: No test data created - used existing seeded bonus sites and reports
context_for_next_testing_agent: SEO Assistant feature is fully tested and working. All /api/seo/* endpoints return valid JSON responses (AI-powered). Admin panel accessible at /admin after login. Homepage at / loads correctly with bonus sites, matches, and articles. Previous iteration noted react-helmet-async issue in MatchDetailPage is still present but not critical to SEO Assistant feature.

endpoints_tested.GET /api/seo/dashboard: Returns health_score, total_articles, issues, recommendations - PASS
endpoints_tested.POST /api/seo/keyword-research: Returns keyword analysis with structured JSON - PASS
endpoints_tested.POST /api/seo/content-score: Returns scoring data and word_count - PASS
endpoints_tested.POST /api/auth/login: Admin login with JWT token - PASS

ui_components_tested.Admin Login Page (/admin-login): Login form renders, credentials work, redirects to /admin - PASS
ui_components_tested.Admin Page (/admin): All tabs visible (Domainler, Siteler, SEO Asistanı, Oto İçerik, Makaleler, Maçlar) - PASS
ui_components_tested.SEO Assistant Dashboard: Health score ring, stats cards, issues section, recommendations, reports list - PASS
ui_components_tested.SEO Assistant Tabs: All 6 sub-tabs render correctly (Dashboard, Kelimeler, Denetim, Rakip, Meta, Optimizer) - PASS
ui_components_tested.Homepage (/): Hero section, match hub, bonus sites section, navigation, footer - PASS
